front.title: A proposal for the provisioning of Call Completion Internet Busy using PINT and SPIRITS

abstract.t: This Internet Draft has arisen out of work concentrating on the interconnection of IP and the Public Switched Telephone Network (PSTN) undertaken within the PINT and SPIRITS working group. This Internet Draft describes an implementation architecture for co-operative services initiated from either the PSTN or Internet domains. It further describes how this architecture may be used in provision of a Call Completion Internet Busy (CCIB) aka Internet Call Waiting (ICW) service.
